name: ShootPerson
description:
How to play:

  • Your character will move towards the mouse. 
  • Left click to shoot a new guy.
  • Right click to move back into the last guy.
  • Kill enemies by shooting guys at the enemies.
  • Only guys moving at high speeds will kill enemies.
  • The more guys you have, the more your score will increase when you kill bad guys, but if any of your guys get hit by a bad guy, you will lose a life.

Resources used:

  • 5 Sprites (1-3 subimages each)
  • 100 Lines of Code
  • 5 Objects
  • No sounds
  • 1 room
